snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo netted a hat-trick for Real Madrid in a 5-1 comeback win at home to promoted Deportivo Coruna on Sunday.
abstract: Real Madrid defeats Deportivo La Coruna, 5-1; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo netted a hat-trick for Real Madrid in a 5-1 comeback win at home to promoted Deportivo Coruna on Sunday.

headline.seo: Ronaldo Scores Three Goals in Win for Real Madrid
headline.main: Ronaldo Scores Three Goals in Victory for Real Madrid
headline.print_headline: Ronaldo Scores Three Goals for Real Madrid
